name: [KFC] K's First Challenge
description:
All what you've wanted from a 3rd person action shooter game - in this mini app! Plus contains an incredible world for you to explore... Start the fight with evil forces!

Hi! This is my first project in Unity and I know that you can't even care about it. Basically all thanks go to Harrison Ferrone. He wrote the book "Learning C# by Developing Games with Unity 2020", which I've used as a guide in creating this game (if I can even call it one). 

Version: 1.1.1 (first update). Probably gonna make it big and good, but not tomorrow=(
